A1: primary polling places for voters across Kentucky
RelatedSentence: Early Tuesday morning , a few hundred election workers will set up primary polling places for voters across Kentucky .
The polls are open from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. No one expects long lines at any of the polls .

While that makes things a bit easier for voters who have to squeeze in enough time during a work day to drive to their precinct and cast ballots , it also reveals an unfortunate truth about our democracy .
